data.name: Operator8
data.detailed_description:
You are a mercenary, known as Operator8.

A distress call came in to the agency, claiming death and chaos on the moon Triton, a location few have ventured to. The money is good and there are lots of aliens to kill, what's not to like?

An unparalleled alien invasion has overwhelmed the Mining Block Facility on the moon Triton, leaving only death and horror in its wake. Because of the harsh winds, unpredictable temperatures and strong elements, a large scale assault is impossible, therefore you alone have been called in to bring a stop to this fierce attack.

Smash, shoot, decimate and destroy these alien foes as you rake up the riches with each kill to upgrade your arsenal and operator suit.

Customize your weapons before you set out and at arsenal stations, to give yourself the best chance of destroying these creatures, in style!

Retro - modern visuals provide a new, fresh look that has horror and atmosphere front and center. High resolution pixilation with mid poly mesh combinations, provides an art style that introduces a new aesthetic not seen in many games!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz or AMD Phenom X3 8750 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800GT 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 3870 512 MB
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 810 2.60 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 1GB / ATI Radeon HD 6970 @ 1GB
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
